title: Lemon Dijon Chicken Salad
directions: Add chicken to a large mixing bowl, pour lemon juice over chicken. Add celery, green onions, parsley, mayonnaise, mustard, lemon zest and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately in bread or lettuce leaves or chill in refrigerator up to 1 day.
ingredients: 3 cups cooked diced chicken breasts, cold
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Bread slices or lettuce leaves for serving
